tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LandCoverClassificationResults (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    area_name VARCHAR(255),
    land_cover_type VARCHAR(100),
    classification_date DATE,
    accuracy DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE land_cover_classification (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id UUID NOT NULL,
    classification_result STRING NOT NULL,
    confidence FLOAT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_images (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name STRING NOT NULL,
    image_date DATE NOT NULL,
    image_resolution FLOAT NOT NULL,
    location_coordinates STRING NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_id UUID NOT NULL,
    land_cover_id UUID NOT NULL,
    accuracy FLOAT NOT NULL,
    summary STRING NOT NULL
);
